Level 5 Evocation Spell

Make a flurry of frost, crisp air, and condensed snow crystals erupt from your hands.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Cone of Cold is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Cone of Cold is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Cone of Cold Information

Description: Make a flurry of frost, crisp air, and condensed snow crystals erupt from your hands. On save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 5 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m (Cone) Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: CON Save

How to Acquire Cone of Cold

Cone of Cold can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Wizard, Arctic (Circle of the Land Druid) Hexblade Cone of Cold can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Cone of Cold Tips & Notes

A target with the Wet condition is Vulnerable to Cold/Lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this spell.
